Name: DESTROY Simulator
About the game: DESTROY Simulator is a first person 3D mini game that destroys houses, cars, glass, etc. in a small space There is no particular story, and no enemies appear. Crack it, deform it, and break it all the way to relieve stress! This game can be played in two modes Score Challenge Challenge how much score you can get within 3 minutes The best record will be registered on the Steam leaderboard Free mode You can play freely. Destroy it however you want It is also possible to disable gravity and play in slow motion * This game is a work of fiction. It has nothing to do with anything that really exists Also, the physical behavior of this game is different from the real one.
